name: Taquin Mogus
description:
Taquin Mogus is a platformer and puzzle game where you play a mogus who wants to cross a level with a "Taquin" to join his house.

Taquin Mogus is frenchs student's developped game for a week coding project in first Game-Design year. 

Team : 

Henno Théo : Project Manager, Developper, GameDesigner.

Maxence Ménissier : GameDesigner, Developper.
